author: alxhub
message:
Revert "refactor(forms): Move FormControl to an overridden exported constructor. (#44316)"

This reverts commit cdf50ff9318ff5cdb4cbb1272d9113de8160065c.

Reverting as this needs a little more work on the documentation side, plus
the `export declare interface` syntax in `model.ts` might have unintended
side effects in g3.
